txt.en: You have gained your first point of Reputation!  Reputation points will increase your Standing with the various Factions of Middle-earth.  Your Standings can be viewed on the Reputation Tab of your Character Journal.

You have gained your first point of Reputation! Reputation points will increase your Standing with the various Factions of Middle-earth. Your Standings can be viewed in the Reputation panel which can be accessed via the Start menu under 'Character'.
